UN Security Council delays vote on Gaza aid until FridayU.N. Security Council diplomats delayed until Friday a vote on a resolution to increase humanitarian aid into Gaza and another round of talks took place in Egypt to try to get warring Israel and Hamas to agree on a new truce so hostages can be released. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 01:42:25 GMT P6GEO4SKLZIJHCT5FK4FP4XI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-security-council-delays-vote-on-gaza-aid-until-friday-2023-12-22/Bassam Masoud, Michelle Nichols, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
US-China climate relations brace for US election, envoy changeThe U.S. and China have delivered big wins in climate diplomacy through the unique relationship of their chief climate envoys, but the two countries are bracing for change as the Chinese envoy retires and the U.S. readies for an election. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 01:04:14 GMT Q4RUDJ4TLNJSBB4GOPIV25ZCPQ https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/us-china-climate-relationships-brace-us-election-envoy-change-2023-12-22/Valerie Volcovici, David Stanway可持续发展缔约方大会第二十八届会议
Actor Vin Diesel hit with sexual battery lawsuit by former assistantA former assistant to the actor Vin Diesel filed a lawsuit against him on Thursday alleging that he sexually battered her in 2010 and that she was fired from her job just hours later. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 00:58:22 GMT UW66FRVM5VJA3BTLWMXTSM4AK4 https://www.reuters.com/legal/actor-vin-diesel-hit-with- Sex-battery-lawsuit-by-former-assistant-2023-12-22/Brad Brooks合法的
Second North Korean nuclear reactor appears to be using fuel, IAEA saysA reactor at North Korea's Yongbyon nuclear complex appears for the first time to be using atomic fuel, the U.N. nuclear watchdog said late on Thursday, which would mean the country has a new potential source of plutonium for its nuclear weapons. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:38:50 GMT HROWGFV54BMQ3GPZKOVVSOFRC4 https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/second-north-korean-nuclear-reactor-appears-to-be-using-fuel-iaea-says-2023-12-21/Reuters商业活力
Mass drone attack hits several Kyiv districtsRussian drones bore down on the city of Kyiv early on Friday, with Mayor Vitali Klitschko and other officials reporting strikes on widely separated residential districts. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:40:23 GMT 7BVL26242ZOCLPCURBFSIJQDUA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/drone-hits-kyiv-apartment-building-setting-off-fire-officials-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
More than 20 countries now part of US-led Red Sea coalition, Pentagon saysA total of more than 20 countries have agreed to participate in the new U.S.-led coalition safeguarding commercial traffic in the Red Sea from attacks by Yemen's Houthi movement as more nations join the effort, the Pentagon said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:25:22 GMT LOL4V37ITJMDDI7T32PXF6OWFM https://www.reuters.com/world/more-than-20-countries-now-part-us-led-red-sea-coalition-pentagon-2023-12-21/Phil Stewart世界
Toll from blast and fire at Guinea oil depot rises to 23 dead - statementThe death toll from a blast and fire at an oil terminal in Guinea's capital, Conakry, has increased to 23 from 13 earlier, and the number of injured has risen to 241 from 178, the government said in a statement on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:05:33 GMT ZU4OIS3LXVNCVPBVN5JXLR4WV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/toll-explosion-fire-guinea-fuel-depot-hits-23-dead-241-injured-afp-2023-12-21/Reuters世界非洲
Norwegian cruise ship loses navigation ability in North Sea during stormThe Norwegian cruise ship MS Maud suffered a power outage after a rogue wave shattered windows on the bridge while it sailed in the North Sea, causing the vessel to lose its ability to navigate, Danish authorities and the ship's owner said on Thursday. Gaza war 'most dangerous ever' for journalists, says rights groupThe first 10 weeks of the Israel-Gaza war have been the deadliest recorded for journalists, with the most journalists killed in a single year in one location, the U.S.-based Committee to Protect Journalists (CPJ) said on Thursday.
